title: It boggles the mind how people can fail drug tests when they apply for jobs
body:
So we're looking for another front desk person, and we thought we had one; but it turned out she failed the drug test and I was baffled. 

If you're actively looking for work, wouldn't you refrain from using illegal drugs and alcohol in case you were called in to take a drug test? 

I know that there are some medications that people take that can cause a red flag in a drug test, but if you have a doctor's note regarding that prescription it wouldn't be a problem. 99 times out of 100 they indulged in something they shouldn't have. 

I just don't get people sometimes
